Class UserControllerTests

java.lang.Object
be.projet3.toutouapp.UserControllerTests
@SpringBootTest @TestMethodOrder(org.junit.jupiter.api.MethodOrderer.OrderAnnotation.class) @AutoConfigureMockMvc public class UserControllerTests extends Object
These tests validate the functionality of user management endpoints in the controller.
